PERSONA:
meet robert, a 68-year-old married man living in a metropolitan area in the mountain division of the western united states. robert is a high school graduate with no further formal education and identifies as a white non-hispanic born in the u.s.

although robert doesn't affiliate with any particular religion and never attends religious services, he considers himself spiritual and holds moderate to conservative political views. despite leaning towards the democratic party, he prefers to identify as an independent voter.

coming from a middle-income household earning between $60,000 and $70,000 annually, robert is a registered voter who takes his civic duties seriously. he is an avid internet user, browsing several times a day, but doesn't actively participate in volunteerism.

robert values his family life and enjoys spending time with his wife. in his leisure time, he likes to stay informed about current events and engage in intellectual discussions with friends and family members who share similar moderate political leanings.
